thread.title: BRIEF-City Office REIT Announces Sale Of Washington Group Plaza Property For $86.5 Mln

title: BRIEF-City Office REIT Announces Sale Of Washington Group Plaza Property For $86.5 Mln

organizations.name: brief-city office reit announces sale of washington group
brief-city office reit announces sale of washington group plaza property

text: March 9, 2018 / 11:04 AM / in 13 minutes BRIEF-City Office REIT Announces Sale Of Washington Group Plaza Property For $86.5 Mln Reuters Staff March 9 (Reuters) - City Office Reit Inc: * CITY OFFICE REIT ANNOUNCES SALE OF WASHINGTON GROUP PLAZA PROPERTY FOR $86.5 MILLION * CITY OFFICE REIT - PROCEEDS FROM SALE WILL BE USED TO REPAY ABOUT $32.1 MILLION OF MORTGAGE DEBT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
